intro: This document serves as a comprehensive Land Cover/Land Use (LC/LU) nomenclature guideline for the Copernicus Priority Area Monitoring product focusing on Riparian Zones (RZ). It provides detailed descriptions of all LC/LU classes pertinent to riparian environments, outlining their geographical characteristics, identifying suitable input datasets, and detailing relevant interpretation methods. This Product User Manual (PUM) is intended to ensure consistent and accurate mapping of riparian areas within the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service.
